Chapter 2082 - 2082 A Friend Came From Far Away... Splash A Bucket Of Dirty Water! (1)

2082 A Friend Came From Far Away… Splash a Bucket of Dirty Water! (1)

Saint Fall!

When the world let out a cry again, everyone realized that Yan Wuse’s era had come to an end.

His end came amid the storm.

The light of spiritual cultivation was not a light of Upanishad. He had died at the hands of the Water of Upanishad and there was no way he could be resurrected.

As strong as a demi-saint was…

On Abyss Island, two had already fallen.

This did not include the extraordinary deaths of the Divine Oracle and Ye Xiao.

“Sky City has its demi-saint foundational roots, but it was also the burial ground of demi-saints.”

Everyone on Abyss Island realized that this was not a legend, nor was it a joke.

Even they ran the risk of dying at any time under the ferocious gazes of the ghost beasts on the Inner Island.

“Another one died…”

On the dragon’s head, Xu Xiaoshou emerged from his sudden bout of sadness and felt a little absent-minded.

Before he came to Abyss Island, in his world, the demi-saints were at the peak of their combat strength in the Shengshen Continent.

They represented the supreme, invincible, and undying.

After he arrived at Abyss Island, he found that the demi-saint was not invincible. It was only a sort of realm.

As long as the plan was appropriate, he knew how to set up a trap.

Even the higher void level, the Cutting Path Stage and the Dao Realm were able to kill a demi-saint.

“He clearly wanted to say something…”

Xu Xiaoshou saw how Yan Wuse gazed at the Saint Statue before he died.

He also recalled the conversation he had with the light of spiritual cultivation at the Fallen Abyss.

“It’s rare to be muddle-headed…”

At first, Xu Xiaoshou merely tried to use his persuasive powers when he coaxed Yan Wuse to retreat and avoid the war.

Unexpectedly, from the perspective of results, it became a prophecy again!

“So, this was also the Guidance of the Blood World Pearl?”

From his experience when he controlled the Divine Oracle, Yan Wuse, Rao Yaoyao, and the others were deeply affected by the Blood World Pearl.

That item was also known as the ‘source of disaster’, the Guidance of death and its power of guidance was unparalleled.

This ‘source of disaster’ could be understood as the chaos of Abyss Island.

There was no need to talk about death. Xu Xiaoshou had witnessed the deaths of countless people along the way.

He had made up his mind!

Regardless whether the deaths of Jiang Buyi, Yan Wuse, and the others were related to the Five Decays of Heaven and Man and the Blood World Pearl…

Even if the Five Decays of Heaven and Man showed great kindness to him…

He absolutely refused to cooperate with the Five Decays of Heaven and Man again. He absolutely opposed his little junior sister’s going off with the Five Decays of Heaven and Man.

Before the Lone Star of the Heavenly Calamity completely undid the Blood World Pearl and threw that d*mned thing away.

“Unless…”

“Unless he can perfectly control the Blood World Pearl, just like how Water Ghost could perfectly control the Sea God’s Trident.”

But Xu Xiaoshou had another thought.

The combination of the Body of Decay and the Blood World Pearl was indeed like the combination of the Water-type Upanishad and the Sea God’s Trident.

They were all extreme abilities and complemented the top ten Great Psionic Weapons.

However, the combination of the first two might not result in greater success, but rather in the host’s more rapid death?

“Precious Dragon, have you heard of the Blood World Pearl?” Xu Xiaoshou lowered his head and asked shamelessly.

“I am aware of it. The treasure of the Third Ancestor of the White Vein, Seven Trees Emperor, was left in the Blood World. After a while, it should have been taken away by the orange man from before.” The Demonic Emperor Black Dragon nodded.

What orange man…

It took Xu Xiaoshou a while to realize that the orange masked man was the Five Decays of Heaven and Man. He almost laughed out loud in his endless sorrow.

Soon, he smiled and noticed the main point.

Seven Trees Emperor?

The appearance of the Blood World Pearl and the shadow of the Seven Trees Emperor behind it was a new discovery!

“What do you think of that orange man?”

When the Demonic Emperor Black Dragon heard this, he continued to stare at the flashy person who had suddenly appeared in the distance. It transmitted its voice.

“He must be the Seven Trees Emperor’s backup plan. He has the Body of Decay and the Blood World Pearl.”

“The chaos on Abyss Island might not be caused by him, but at least half of cause and effect was due of his presence.”

“His presence led to everyone’s worst outcome.”

“Once the chaos appeared, the Seven Trees Emperor’s goal might be achieved, although I don’t know what it was.”

“But this was definitely what Bazhun’an wanted. He said he wanted ‘chaos’.”

So…

To put it bluntly, there was also the shadow of Bazhun’an here?

Xu Xiaoshou was stunned for a moment. He could not help but shake his head and clicked his tongue.

Strange!

There were some things that he really couldn’t think about too intently as it was quite terrifying.

“But how did the Seven Trees Emperor lock so accurately onto the sky… that orange man, was this part of his plan?”

Xu Xiaoshou did not completely or soundly understand the Seven Trees Emperor, let alone predict his methods.

The Demonic Emperor Black Dragon shook its head frankly and said matter-of-factly.

“I don’t know.”

“Perhaps there’s a partial guidance of the Holy Emperor’s will or perhaps it’s a coincidence, or perhaps it’s both.”

“But even if it wasn’t the orange man, there are still may other types of people here. The effect might be slightly worse, but it’s not too bad.”

When he heard this, Xu Xiaoshou understood.

It would be best if it was the Five Decays of Heaven and Man, but it didn’t matter if it wasn’t.

Since the Seven Trees Emperor had made a move, the Blood World Pearl would definitely appear.

As long as this thing entered the arena, it did nothing. Its presence in the arena was a guidance for people to the path of death.

This would definitely create chaos!

And what kind of initiative did this support bead need?

Water Ghost could use his own initiative. The pearl obediently reflected the scarlet future beside him. It was completely enough.

“There’s Water Ghost inside and a Blood World Pearl outside… If I didn’t ask, I would have thought that it was a coincidence.”
